Name: Kohl Pot with Lotus Flowers
Description: The small pot was used to store kohl, an eye paint used to enhance beauty and protect the eyes. The pot's body is decorated with incised geometric yellow lines, while its lid is ornamented with a big rose in the center and with four lotus flowers surrounding it. Using lotus flowers as decoration symbolized resurrection. It was believed that when people smelled lotus flowers, life was given back to the deceased.
